code: import React from"react";import{Line}from"react-chartjs-2";var chart=function chart(_ref){var info=_ref.info;var lab=[];var points=[];info.map(function(val){lab.push(val.id);});info.map(function(val){points.push(val.points);});var data={labels:lab,datasets:[{data:points,fill:false,borderColor:"#24669A",pointBackgroundColor:"#24669A"}]};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"chart"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Line,{data:data,height:300,width:500,options:{maintainAspectRatio:false,responsive:true,scales:{xAxes:[{gridLines:{drawOnChartArea:false},type:"category"}]},legend:{display:false}}}));};export default chart;
